surveyBuilderSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Survey Builder

Here, you can create, edit and share surveys with VOF learners. You can also invite collaborators on a survey with whom you can edit the survey and view its responses.
This is the survey builder which youâ€™ll use to set up a survey. You can conveniently add questions and their descriptions, sections.
This section will show the live preview of the survey you are building on the left.
You can use this to toggle the survey builder preview pane.
You can use this to maximize/minimize the survey builder.
Having created your survey, you can use this button to save the survey, share it with collaborators and the recipients. Watch Demo
This is the question box, using this, you can select your question type, type in your question and set its options.
Clicking on this, you can add a new question to the survey.
You can also use this to add a section to the survey.
